Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to keep track of a players hand and score (along with other things)

      • takeCardFish

        public Card takeCardFish(Card c)
        Removing a card from the player specifically for GoFish. This is because the suit of the card does not matter for removal in GoFish.
        Parameters:
        c - A card to remove.
        Returns:
        the card that was taken from the player.
